page.title: 20A Family Weekend
page.content: {Saturday} my mother rose at 06.30 and made breakfast.My brother and I got up at 07.30 and went down stairs.We all washed,dressed and walked up to the Post Office where my mother works on Saturday.I waited there for Lisa Thomas and then we went to town.We looked around the shops and had lunch. We went to the Leisure Centre and then Lisa came back to my house where my mother gave us tea. After playing,we took Lisa home.We watched T.V. for a while and went to bed.{Sunday,}my mother was up early washing clothes.My brother and I got up at 09.00 and had breakfast.My mother cleaned upstairs and I cleaned downstairs.We had lunch at 13.30 and then cleaned up.My brother and I played tennis while Mum ironed.After we had our tea I had a bath while my brother went to revise
